channel.title: Error help (putting random event in)

item.title: Error help (putting random event in)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

It’s telling you that you are adding a boolean feild when the parameters don’t accept booleans.

Yz85Racer:

You do not have a newNPC(int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int) method.

Read full topic

item.title: Error help (putting random event in)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

It is also basically, and it is not “btw”, as the correct version is, by the way. Having said that, you do not also use a capital letter after a quotation mark. It is also not good grammar to begin a sentence with “and”, as it is a joining word.

Read full topic

item.title: Error help (putting random event in)
item.dc:creator: @Noob_Slayerz Noob Slayerz
item.description:
@Noob_Slayerz wrote:

And btw it’s “Any” not “Eny” And also it’s “Thanks” Not “Thank’s” You’re basicly saying thank is?

Read full topic

Check NPCHandler, replace the void newNPC(…) { from another server.

item.title: Error help (putting random event in)
item.dc:creator: @vipersniper100 vipersniper100
item.description:
@vipersniper100 wrote:

ok i get this error

client.java:14: newNPC(int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int) in NPCHandler ca nnot be applied to (int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,boolean) server.npcHandler.newNPC(npc, absX+1, absY+4, 0, absX + 9, absY + 2, absX + -7, absY + -8, 1, hp, false); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
eny help? thank’s

[code]public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public int randomTimer = 20;
public void irnpc(int npc, int hp, String text, int emote, int dmg)
{
server.npcHandler.newNPC(npc, absX+1, absY+4, 0, absX + 9, absY + 2,

absX + -7, absY + -8, 1, hp, false);
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{

client person = (client)p;//by xema
if(p != null && person != null)
{
for(int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.npcs.length; i++)
{//by xema
if((server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) &&

(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == npc))
{
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].updateRequired =

true;
server.npcHandler.npcs

[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].textUpdate =

“”+text;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].StartKilling =

playerId;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].RandomWalk =

false;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsUnderAttack =

true;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].animNumber =

emote;
server.npcHandler.npcs[i].hitDiff = dmg;
}
}
}
}
} [/code]
